AltAttributeAssessment.none: Image alt attribute: None of the {imagesWithoutAltAttribute} images contain an alternative text attribute. Add them!
AltAttributeAssessment.some: Image alt attribute: Some of the {imagesWithoutAltAttribute} images contain an alternative text attribute. Add them!
AltAttributeAssessment.every: Image alt attribute: All images contain an alternative text attribute. Good job!

HeadingStructureOrderAssessment.sequential: Heading order: The heading structure is in sequential order. Good job!
HeadingStructureOrderAssessment.nonSequential: Heading order: The heading structure is not in sequential order. Fix your heading structure!

SingleH1Assessment.one: Single H1: The text contains a single H1 tag. Good job!
SingleH1Assessment.multiple: Single H1: The text contains multiple H1 tags. Rethink your heading structure!
SingleH1Assessment.none: Single H1: The text contains no H1 tag. Add it!
